game_description: "SUPERHOT VR feels downright rapturous‚Äù - Polygon Multi-award winning, smash-hit SUPERHOT VR blurs the lines between cautious strategy and unbridled mayhem. The definitive VR action experience. Time moves only when you move. No regenerating health bars. No conveniently placed ammo drops. It's you, alone, outnumbered and outgunned. Snatch weapons from fallen enemies to shoot, slice and dodge through a truly cinematic hurricane of slow-motion bullets. It‚Äôs like nothing you have ever played before. Something is different here. Lose track of what‚Äôs real. Loved by millions, timeless yet improved, Quest delivers the definitive SUPERHOT VR experience. Painstakingly rebuilt as originally destined to be. Nothing distracts from the rush of SUPERHOT‚Äôs signature slow-motion combat. Pyramids within levels are gone. Flow unhindered through the action like a ballerina of death. No tethers. No compromise. MIND IS SOFTWARE YOU ARE NOW FREE
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: This is a pretty good starter for new Oculus users who want some action. The game provides a wide variety of weapons and different game modes. Great game, no complaints from me! The enemies put up a good fight and will make you sweat! Just putting that out there. Thank you developers for making an amazing first game experience for me that I will never forget. :)
